sentences.en: 20 th Century Fox decided that the movie Ice Age needed a sequel.
sentences.cn: 二十世纪福斯影片公司决定开拍续集.

sentences.en: He is writing a sequel to his latest best seller.
sentences.cn: 他正在写他的最新畅销书的续集.

sentences.en: His speech had an unfortunate sequel, in that it caused a riot.
sentences.cn: 他的演说产生了不幸的后果, 由之引发一场骚乱.

sentences.en: I love doing sequels, But this is my favourite sequel.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢拍续集, 但是这次无疑是我最爱的续集.

sentences.en: Paper delivery: a pass - through, indirect delivery, beyond the sequel paper.
sentences.cn: 纸张传递方式: 直接传递 、 间接传递 、 超越续纸.

sentences.en: Richard Chamberlain has agreed to make a sequel to "The Thorn Birds".
sentences.cn: 理查德·张伯伦已经同意接拍《荆棘鸟》的续集。

sentences.en: She is currently writing a sequel to Daphne du Maurier's "Rebecca"
sentences.cn: 她现在正在续写达夫妮·杜穆里埃的小说《蝴蝶梦》。

sentences.en: Some important new characters appear in the sequel.
sentences.cn: 在续篇中出现了一些重要的新人物.

sentences.en: The affair had a strange sequel.
sentences.cn: 这一事件的结局很奇怪.

sentences.en: The arrests were a "direct sequel" to investigations.
sentences.cn: 调查的“直接结果”就是这些抓捕行动。

sentences.en: The sequel to this novel is eagerly anticipate by many readers.
sentences.cn: 许多读者都热切地期待着这本小说的问世.

sentences.en: This movie is a sequel to The Graduate , and is directed by Rob Reiner.
sentences.cn: 本片由劳勃?雷纳执导, 是《华业生》续集.

sentences.en: This wise decision enabled him to make a sequel to Star Wars.
sentences.cn: 这个聪明的决定使他能够拍出《星际大战》的续集.

sentences.en: Whether Captain Turnbill or I were right, remains to be proved sequel.
sentences.cn: 究竟是''.'特'.''''.'恩'. ''比船长对还是我对, 尚待日后加以证实.

sentences.en: Would you like to see the sequel to this movie?
sentences.cn: 你想看这部电影的续集 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a book, film, play etc that continues the story of an earlier one, usually written or made by the same person
